key.name: refreshrate
key.description: The rate in seconds at which the battery information is updated.

key.name: decimal-places
key.description: The number of decimal places to show for power and rate values.

key.name: display-mode
key.description: What to display in the panel: 0=Watts, 1=%/h, 2=Both.

key.name: smoothing-samples
key.description: The number of readings to average for a smoother display. Higher is smoother but less responsive.

key.name: show-rate-unit
key.description: Whether to show the "%/h" unit next to the rate value in the panel.

key.name: show-icon
key.description: Whether to show the battery icon in the panel.

key.name: use-color-coding
key.description: Whether to use red/green colors for battery status in the panel.
